name: Like Crazy
summary_text: A British college student falls for an American student, only to be separated from him when she's banned from the U.S. after overstaying her visa.

name: Friday Night Lights
summary_text: Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.

name: The Spirit
summary_text: Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City.

name: Darkman
summary_text: A brilliant scientist left for dead returns to exact revenge on the people who burned him alive.

name: Irrational Man
summary_text: A tormented philosophy professor finds a will to live when he commits an existential act.

name: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation
summary_text: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family.

name: The Haunting in Connecticut
summary_text: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, and uncover a sinister history.

name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
summary_text: After the Republic's victory on Christophsis, Anakin and his new apprentice Ahsoka Tano must rescue the kidnapped son of Jabba the Hutt. Political intrigue complicates their mission.

name: The Man Who Knew Too Much
summary_text: A tale of innocent American tourists in Morocco whose son's kidnapping sets off a twisting plot of international intrigue.

name: The Collector
summary_text: Desperate to repay his debt to his ex-wife, an ex-con plots a heist at his new employer's country home, unaware that a second criminal has also targeted the property, and rigged it with a series of deadly traps.

name: National Lampoon's European Vacation
summary_text: The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.

name: Time Bandits
summary_text: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

name: Enough Said
summary_text: A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.

name: The Snowman
summary_text: Detective Harry Hole investigates the disappearance of a woman whose scarf is found wrapped around an ominous-looking snowman.

name: Timecrimes
summary_text: A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.

name: Heavenly Creatures
summary_text: Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

name: The Body
summary_text: A detective searches for the body of a femme fatale which has gone missing from a morgue.

name: Pride and Glory
summary_text: A family's moral codes are tested when Ray Tierney investigates a case that reveals an incendiary police corruption scandal involving his own brother-in-law. For Ray, the truth is revelatory, a Pandora's Box that threatens to upend not only the Tierney legacy but the entire NYPD.

name: Point Break
summary_text: A young FBI agent infiltrates an extraordinary team of extreme sports athletes he suspects of masterminding a string of unprecedented, sophisticated corporate heists.

name: Soorarai Pottru
summary_text: Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.

name: The Rescuers
summary_text: Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.

name: The Frozen Ground
summary_text: An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.

name: Vertical Limit
summary_text: A climber must rescue his sister on top of K2, one of the world's biggest mountains.

name: Charlie St. Cloud
summary_text: After Charlie survives a car crash that kills his younger brother, he is given the gift of seeing the spirits of his brother and others who he has lost, and must use his powers to save the woman he loves from impending disaster.

name: Titan A.E.
summary_text: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.

name: Red Lights
summary_text: Psychologist Margaret Matheson and her assistant study paranormal activity, which leads them to investigate a world-renowned psychic who has resurfaced years after his toughest critic mysteriously passed away.

name: The Replacements
summary_text: During a pro football strike, the owners hire substitute players.

name: La Strada
summary_text: A care-free girl is sold to a traveling entertainer, consequently enduring physical and emotional pain along the way.

name: Jeepers Creepers 2
summary_text: Set a few days after the original, a championship basketball team's bus is attacked by The Creeper, the winged, flesh-eating terror, on the last day of his 23-day feeding frenzy.

name: Everybody's Fine
summary_text: A widower who realized his only connection to his family was through his wife sets off on an impromptu road trip to reunite with each of his grown children.

name: Marathon Man
summary_text: A history student becomes caught in the middle of a dangerous international plot involving Nazis, stolen jewels, and government agents.

name: S1m0ne
summary_text: A producer's film is endangered when his star walks off, so he decides to digitally create an actress to substitute for the star, becoming an overnight sensation that everyone thinks is a real person.

name: The Brave One
summary_text: Struggling to recover emotionally from a brutal assault that killed her fiancé and left her in a coma, a radio personality begins a quest for vengeance against the perpetrators that leaves a bloody trail across New York City.

name: Takers
summary_text: A group of bank robbers find their multi-million dollar plan interrupted by a hard-boiled detective.

name: Appaloosa
summary_text: Two friends hired to police a small town that is suffering under the rule of a rancher find their job complicated by the arrival of a young widow.

name: Becoming Jane
summary_text: A biographical portrait of a pre-fame Jane Austen and her romance with a young Irishman.

name: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
summary_text: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

name: A Serbian Film
summary_text: An aging porn star agrees to participate in an "art film" in order to make a clean break from the business, only to discover that he has been drafted into making a pedophilia and necrophilia themed snuff film.

name: Keeping Up with the Joneses
summary_text: A suburban couple becomes embroiled in an international espionage plot when they discover that their seemingly perfect new neighbors are government spies.

name: Gold
summary_text: Kenny Wells, a prospector desperate for a lucky break, teams up with a similarly eager geologist and sets off on a journey to find gold in the uncharted jungle of Indonesia.

name: Perfect Strangers
summary_text: Seven long-time friends get together for a dinner. When they decide to share with each other the content of every text message, email and phone call they receive, many secrets start to unveil and the equilibrium trembles.

name: Peppermint
summary_text: Five years after her husband and daughter are killed in a senseless act of violence, a woman comes back from self-imposed exile to seek revenge against those responsible and the system that let them go free.

name: The Young Victoria
summary_text: A dramatization of the turbulent first years of Queen Victoria's rule, and her enduring romance with Prince Albert.

name: Fractured
summary_text: A couple stops at a gas station, where their 6 y.o. daughter's arm is fractured. They hurry to a hospital. Something strange is going on there. The wife and daughter go missing.

name: Half Baked
summary_text: The story of three not so bright men who come up with a series of crazy schemes to get a friend out of jail.

name: Mank
summary_text: 1930's Hollywood is reevaluated through the eyes of scathing social critic and alcoholic screenwriter Herman J. Mankiewicz as he races to finish the screenplay of Citizen Kane (1941).

name: Ice Age: Collision Course
summary_text: When Scrat's acorn sends an asteroid to Earth, the Herd must find a way to stop the asteroid from hitting Earth with the help of a returning friend.

name: The Crimson Rivers
summary_text: A murder detective must follow the footsteps of a brutal killer within the secrets of a classist college.

name: Drillbit Taylor
summary_text: Three kids hire a low-budget bodyguard to protect them from the playground bully.

name: Kahaani
summary_text: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met him.

name: The Dead Don't Die
summary_text: The peaceful town of Centerville finds itself battling a zombie horde as the dead start rising from their graves.

name: Fanny and Alexander
summary_text: Two young Swedish children experience the many comedies and tragedies of their family, the Ekdahls.

name: Dick Tracy
summary_text: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

name: Mindhunters
summary_text: Trainees in the FBI's psychological profiling program must put their training into practice when they discover a killer in their midst.

name: Something Borrowed
summary_text: Friendships are tested and secrets come to the surface when terminally single Rachel falls for Dex, her best friend Darcy's fiancé.

name: The Cat in the Hat
summary_text: Two bored children have their lives turned upside down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

name: The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari
summary_text: Hypnotist Dr. Caligari uses a somnambulist, Cesare, to commit murders.

name: The Darkest Hour
summary_text: In Moscow, five young people lead the charge against an alien race who have attacked Earth via our power supply.

name: The Chorus
summary_text: The new teacher at a severely administered boys' boarding school works to positively affect the students' lives through music.

name: Grudge Match
summary_text: A pair of aging boxing rivals are coaxed out of retirement to fight one final bout, thirty years after their last match.

name: Breach
summary_text: FBI upstart Eric O'Neill enters into a power game with his boss, Robert Hanssen, an agent who was put on trial for selling secrets to the Soviet Union.

name: Hera Pheri
summary_text: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

name: Save the Last Dance
summary_text: A white midwestern girl moves to Chicago, where her new boyfriend is a black teen from the South Side with a rough, semi-criminal past.

name: Zookeeper
summary_text: A group of zoo animals decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zookeeper find love, without opting to leave his current job for something more illustrious.

name: Soylent Green
summary_text: A nightmarish futuristic fantasy about the controlling power of big corporations and an innocent cop who stumbles on the truth.

name: Cocoon
summary_text: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigor.

name: G.O.R.A.
summary_text: A slick young Turk kidnapped by extraterrestrials shows his great « humanitarian spirit » by outwitting the evil commander-in-chief of the planet of G.O.R.A.

name: We Are Marshall
summary_text: When a plane crash claims the lives of members of the Marshall University football team and some of its fans, the team's new coach and his surviving players try to keep the football program alive.

name: The Best Years of Our Lives
summary_text: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

name: Gunday
summary_text: The lives of Calcutta's most powerful Gunday, Bikram and Bala, changes when Nandita enters it. Then a counter-force takes charge and a thriller unfolds.

name: Excalibur
summary_text: Merlin the magician helps Arthur Pendragon unite the Britons around the Round Table of Camelot, even as dark forces conspire to tear it apart.

name: All Quiet on the Western Front
summary_text: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.

name: Shallow Grave
summary_text: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

name: Out of Time
summary_text: A Florida police chief must solve a vicious double homicide before he himself falls under suspicion.

name: V/H/S
summary_text: When a group of misfits are hired by an unknown third party to burglarize a desolate house and acquire a rare VHS tape, they discover more found footage than they bargained for.

name: Bernie
summary_text: In small-town Texas, an affable mortician strikes up a friendship with a wealthy widow, though when she starts to become controlling, he goes to great lengths to separate himself from her grasp.

name: Re-Animator
summary_text: After an odd new medical student arrives on campus, a dedicated local and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue.

name: Rudy
summary_text: Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

name: The Little Prince
summary_text: A little girl lives in a very grown-up world with her mother, who tries to prepare her for it. Her neighbor, the Aviator, introduces the girl to an extraordinary world where anything is possible, the world of the Little Prince.

name: A Tale of Two Sisters
summary_text: A family is haunted by the tragedies of deaths within the family.

name: Short Circuit
summary_text: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

name: The Possession
summary_text: A young girl buys an antique box at a yard sale, unaware that inside the collectible lives a malicious ancient spirit. The girl's father teams with his ex-wife to find a way to end the curse upon their child.

name: The Piano Teacher
summary_text: A young man romantically pursues his masochistic piano teacher.

name: Date Movie
summary_text: Spoof of romantic comedies which focuses on a man, his crush, his parents, and her father.

name: The Animal
summary_text: After receiving organ transplants from various animal donors, a man finds himself taking on the traits of those animals.

name: A Night at the Roxbury
summary_text: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.

name: Gridiron Gang
summary_text: Teenagers at a juvenile detention center, under the leadership of their counselor, gain self-esteem by playing football together.

name: Fifty Shades Freed
summary_text: Anastasia and Christian get married, but Jack Hyde continues to threaten their relationship.

name: Blow-Up
summary_text: A fashion photographer unknowingly captures a death on film after following two lovers in a park.

name: Dennis the Menace
summary_text: When his parents have to go out of town, Dennis stays with Mr. and Mrs. Wilson. The little menace is driving Mr. Wilson crazy, but Dennis is just trying to be helpful. Even to the thief who's arrived in town.

name: The Emoji Movie
summary_text: Gene, a multi-expressional emoji, sets out on a journey to become a normal emoji.

name: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle
summary_text: A human child raised by wolves must face off against a menacing tiger named Shere Khan, as well as his own origins.

name: 365 Days
summary_text: Massimo is a member of the Sicilian Mafia family and Laura is a sales director. She does not expect that on a trip to Sicily trying to save her relationship, Massimo will kidnap her and give her 365 days to fall in love with him.

name: Solace
summary_text: Psychic John Clancy (Sir Anthony Hopkins) works with the F.B.I. in order to hunt down a serial killer.

name: Monster-in-Law
summary_text: The love life of Charlotte is reduced to an endless string of disastrous blind dates, until she meets the perfect man, Kevin. Unfortunately, his merciless mother will do anything to destroy their relationship.

name: Pitch Perfect 3
summary_text: Following their win at the world championship, the now separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices.

name: The Square
summary_text: A prestigious Stockholm museum's chief art curator finds himself in times of both professional and personal crisis as he attempts to set up a controversial new exhibit.

name: BASEketball
summary_text: Two childhood friends are pro athletes of a national sport called BASEketball, a hybrid of baseball and basketball, and must deal with a greedy businessman scheming against their team.

name: The Grinch
summary_text: A grumpy Grinch (Benedict Cumberbatch) plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

name: 4 Months, 3 Weeks and 2 Days
summary_text: A woman assists her friend in arranging an illegal abortion in 1980s Romania.

name: Beautiful Boy
summary_text: Based on the best-selling pair of memoirs from father and son David and Nic Sheff, Beautiful Boy chronicles the heartbreaking and inspiring experience of survival, relapse and recovery in a family coping with addiction over many years.

name: Perfect Sense
summary_text: A chef and a scientist fall in love as an epidemic begins to rob people of their sensory perceptions.

name: Hoodwinked!
summary_text: Little Red Riding Hood, the Wolf, the Woodsman, and Granny all tell the police the events that led up to their encounter.

name: Rio Bravo
summary_text: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a cripple, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

name: Ghajini
summary_text: A short-term memory loss patient sets out on his journey to avenge the death of his beloved girl.

name: Cats & Dogs
summary_text: A look at the top-secret, high-tech espionage war going on between cats and dogs, of which their human owners are blissfully unaware.

name: Last Christmas
summary_text: Kate is a young woman subscribed to bad decisions. Working as an elf in a year round Christmas store is not good for the wannabe singer. However, she meets Tom there. Her life takes a new turn. For Kate, it seems too good to be true.

name: Storks
summary_text: Storks have moved on from delivering babies to packages. But when an order for a baby appears, the best delivery stork must scramble to fix the error by delivering the baby.

name: The Ghost and the Darkness
summary_text: A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.

name: RV
summary_text: Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers.

name: Everything Is Illuminated
summary_text: A young Jewish American man endeavors to find the woman who saved his grandfather during World War II in a Ukrainian village, that was ultimately razed by the Nazis, with the help of an eccentric local.

name: Best in Show
summary_text: A behind-the-scenes look into the highly competitive and cut-throat world of dog shows through the eyes of a group of ruthless dog owners.

name: The Lookout
summary_text: Chris is a once promising high school athlete whose life is turned upside down following a tragic accident. As he tries to maintain a normal life, he takes a job as a janitor at a bank, where he ultimately finds himself caught up in a planned heist.

name: Fetih 1453
summary_text: After the death of his father Murat II, Mehmet II ascends to the Ottoman throne. After braving internal and external enemies, he decides to complete what he was destined to do - conquer Constantinople.

name: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
summary_text: It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.

name: The Sisters Brothers
summary_text: In 1850s Oregon, the infamous duo of assassins, Eli Sisters (John C. Reilly) and Charlie Sisters (Joaquin Phoenix), chase a gold prospector and his unexpected ally.

name: Magnum Force
summary_text: San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is on the trail of vigilante Police Officers who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

name: Going the Distance
summary_text: A romantic comedy centered on a guy and a gal who try to keep their love alive as they shuttle back and forth between New York and San Francisco to see one another.

name: Straw Dogs
summary_text: A young American and his English wife come to rural England and face increasingly vicious local harassment.

name: Murder on the Orient Express
summary_text: In December 1935, when his train is stopped by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before.

name: I'm Not There
summary_text: Ruminations on the life of Bob Dylan, where six characters embody a different aspect of the musician's life and work.

name: The Right Stuff
summary_text: The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.

name: The Art of Getting By
summary_text: George, a lonely and fatalistic teen who has made it all the way to his senior year without ever having done a real day of work, is befriended by Sally, a popular but complicated girl who recognizes in him a kindred spirit.

name: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
summary_text: Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Mr. Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy.

name: Jack
summary_text: Because of an unusual disorder that has aged him four times faster than a typical human being, a boy looks like a 40-year-old man as he starts fifth grade at public school after being homeschooled.

name: Alpha
summary_text: In the prehistoric past, a young man struggles to return home after being separated from his tribe during a buffalo hunt. He finds a similarly lost wolf companion and starts a friendship that would change humanity.

name: Valhalla Rising
summary_text: Forced for some time to be a fighting slave, a pagan warrior escapes his captors with a boy and joins a group of Crusaders on their quest to the Holy Land.

name: The Omen
summary_text: An American official realizes that his young son may literally be the Devil incarnate.

name: Calvary
summary_text: After he is threatened during a confession, a good-natured priest must battle the dark forces closing in around him.

name: The Mission
summary_text: Eighteenth-century Spanish Jesuits try to protect a remote South American tribe in danger of falling under the rule of pro-slavery Portugal.

name: Sexy Beast
summary_text: Brutal gangster Don Logan recruits "retired" safecracker Gal for one last job, but it goes badly for both of them.

name: The Great Debaters
summary_text: A drama based on the true story of Melvin B. Tolson, a professor at Wiley College Texas. In 1935, he inspired students to form the school's first debate team, which went on to challenge Harvard in the national championship.

name: The Nanny Diaries
summary_text: A college graduate goes to work as a nanny for a rich New York family. Ensconced in their home, she has to juggle their dysfunction, a new romance, and the spoiled brat in her charge.

name: Race to Witch Mountain
summary_text: A Las Vegas cabbie enlists the help of a UFO expert to protect two siblings with paranormal powers from the clutches of an organization that wants to use the kids for their nefarious plans.

name: Fanboys
summary_text: Star Wars fanatics take a cross-country trip to George Lucas' Skywalker Ranch so their dying friend can see a screening of Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999) before its release.

name: Firewall
summary_text: A security specialist is forced into robbing the bank that he's protecting, as a bid to pay off his family's ransom.

name: Timecop
summary_text: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

name: Hunter Killer
summary_text: An untested American submarine captain teams with U.S. Navy Seals to rescue the Russian president, who has been kidnapped by a rogue general.

name: Drinking Buddies
summary_text: Luke and Kate are coworkers at a brewery who spend their nights drinking and flirting heavily. One weekend away together with their significant others proves who really belongs together and who doesn't.

name: Bad Education
summary_text: An examination on the effect of Franco-era religious schooling and sexual abuse on the lives of two longtime friends.

name: The First Purge
summary_text: America's third political party, the New Founding Fathers of America, comes to power and conducts an experiment: no laws for 12 hours on Staten Island. No one has to stay on the island, but $5,000 is given to anyone who does.

name: High School Musical 2
summary_text: School's out for summer and the East High Wildcats are ready to make it the time of their lives after landing jobs in a wealthy country club owned by Sharpay and Ryan's family.

name: Night on Earth
summary_text: An anthology of 5 different cab drivers in 5 American and European cities and their remarkable fares on the same eventful night.

name: Dog Soldiers
summary_text: A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the Scotland wilderness.

name: Cry-Baby
summary_text: In 1950s Baltimore, a bad boy with a heart of gold wins the love of a good girl, whose boyfriend sets out for revenge.

name: Duck Soup
summary_text: Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.

name: Terms of Endearment
summary_text: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.

name: Step Up 3D
summary_text: A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.

name: Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over
summary_text: Carmen's caught in a virtual reality game designed by the Kids' new nemesis, the Toymaker. It's up to Juni to save his sister, and ultimately the world.

name: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
summary_text: When it becomes clear that his solo album is a failure, a former boy band member does everything in his power to maintain his celebrity status.

name: Traitor
summary_text: When straight arrow FBI agent Roy Clayton heads up the investigation into a dangerous international conspiracy, all clues seem to lead back to former U.S. Special Operations officer, Samir Horn.

name: Bringing Up Baby
summary_text: While trying to secure a $1 million donation for his museum, a befuddled paleontologist is pursued by a flighty and often irritating heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.

name: Jonah Hex
summary_text: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

name: Duplex
summary_text: A young couple has a chance to move into a gorgeous duplex in the perfect New York neighborhood. All they have to do is bump off the current tenant, a cute little old lady.

name: Chariots of Fire
summary_text: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew, and the other a devout Christian, compete in the 1924 Olympics.

name: Red Planet
summary_text: Astronauts, and their robotic dog AMEE (Autonomous Mapping Evaluation and Evasion), search for solutions to save a dying Earth by searching on Mars, only to have the mission go terribly awry.

name: Underground
summary_text: A group of Serbian socialists prepares for the war in a surreal underground filled by parties, tragedies, love and hate.

name: The Girl with All the Gifts
summary_text: A scientist and a teacher living in a dystopian future embark on a journey of survival with a special young girl named Melanie.

name: The Wages of Fear
summary_text: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

name: Lake Placid
summary_text: Three people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

name: Young Guns
summary_text: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

name: The Player
summary_text: A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected, but which one?

name: Climax
summary_text: French dancers gather in a remote, empty school building to rehearse on a wintry night. The all-night celebration morphs into a hallucinatory nightmare when they learn their sangria is laced with LSD.

name: Draft Day
summary_text: At the NFL Draft, General Manager Sonny Weaver has the opportunity to rebuild his team when he trades for the number one pick. He must decide what he's willing to sacrifice on a life-changing day for a few hundred young men with NFL dreams.

name: The Sweetest Thing
summary_text: A girl finds she is forced to educate herself on the etiquette of wooing the opposite sex when she finally meets Mr. Right.

name: Velvet Buzzsaw
summary_text: A satire set in the contemporary art world scene of Los Angeles, where big money artists and mega-collectors pay a high price when art collides with commerce.

name: The Karate Kid Part III
summary_text: Ostracised villain John Kreese attempts to gain revenge on Daniel and Miyagi, with the help of a Vietnam War comrade, the wealthy owner of a toxic waste disposal business.

name: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
summary_text: The Bakers, while on vacation, find themselves competing with a rival family of eight children.

name: Session 9
summary_text: Tensions rise within an asbestos cleaning crew as they work in an abandoned mental hospital with a horrific past that seems to be coming back.

name: The Return of the Living Dead
summary_text: When two bumbling employees at a medical supply warehouse accidentally release a deadly gas into the air, the vapors cause the dead to rise again as zombies.

name: Copycat
summary_text: An agoraphobic psychologist and a female detective must work together to take down a serial killer who copies serial killers from the past.

name: Poltergeist
summary_text: A family whose suburban home is haunted by evil forces must come together to rescue their youngest daughter after the apparitions take her captive.

name: Dolemite Is My Name
summary_text: Eddie Murphy portrays real-life legend Rudy Ray Moore, a comedy and rap pioneer who proved naysayers wrong when his hilarious, obscene, kung-fu fighting alter ego, Dolemite, became a 1970s Blaxploitation phenomenon.

name: Benny & Joon
summary_text: A mentally ill young woman finds her love in an eccentric man who models himself after Buster Keaton.

name: Crimes and Misdemeanors
summary_text: An ophthalmologist's mistress threatens to reveal their affair to his wife while a married documentary filmmaker is infatuated with another woman.

name: Coolie No. 1
summary_text: After being insulted by a rich businessman named Rosario, pandit Jai Kishen teaches him a lesson by getting his daughter married to Raju - a Coolie posing as a millionaire.

name: Hotel Mumbai
summary_text: The true story of the Taj Hotel terrorist attack in Mumbai. Hotel staff risk their lives to keep everyone safe as people make unthinkable sacrifices to protect themselves and their families.

name: Salò, or the 120 Days of Sodom
summary_text: In World War II Italy, four fascist libertines round up nine adolescent boys and girls and subject them to one hundred and twenty days of physical, mental and sexual torture.

name: Animal Kingdom
summary_text: A seventeen-year-old navigates his survival amongst an explosive criminal family and the detective who thinks he can save him.

name: In the Loop
summary_text: A political satire about a group of skeptical American and British operatives attempting to prevent a war between two countries.

name: Proof of Life
summary_text: Alice hires a professional negotiator to obtain the release of her engineer husband, who has been kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas in South America.

name: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
summary_text: An ex-mercenary is forced out of isolation when three mysterious men kidnap and brainwash the city's children afflicted with the Geostigma disease.

name: The Dressmaker
summary_text: A glamorous woman returns to her small town in rural Australia. With her sewing machine and haute couture style, she transforms the women and exacts sweet revenge on those who did her wrong.

name: Bangkok Dangerous
summary_text: A hitman who's in Bangkok to pull off a series of jobs violates his personal code when he falls for a local woman and bonds with his errand boy.

name: I, Daniel Blake
summary_text: After having suffered a heart-attack, a 59-year-old carpenter must fight the bureaucratic forces of the system in order to receive Employment and Support Allowance.

name: The Little Things
summary_text: Kern County Deputy Sheriff Joe Deacon is sent to Los Angeles for what should have been a quick evidence-gathering assignment. Instead, he becomes embroiled in the search for a serial killer who is terrorizing the city.

name: Innerspace
summary_text: A test pilot is miniaturized in a secret experiment, and accidentally injected into a hapless store clerk.

name: Ladder 49
summary_text: A firefighter, injured and trapped in a burning building, has flashbacks of his life as he drifts in and out of consciousness. Meanwhile, fellow firefighters led by the Chief attempt to rescue him.

name: Mother
summary_text: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

name: Ouija: Origin of Evil
summary_text: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her daughters add a new stunt to bolster their seance scam business by inviting an evil presence into their home, not realizing how dangerous it is.
A simple yet proud farmer in the year 1922 conspires to murder his wife for financial gain, convincing his teenage son to assist. But their actions have unintended consequences.

name: America's Sweethearts
summary_text: A movie publicist deals with the messy public split of his movie's co-stars while keeping reporters at bay while a reclusive director holds the film's print hostage.

name: Coming 2 America
summary_text: The African monarch Akeem learns he has a long-lost son in the United States and must return to America to meet this unexpected heir and build a relationship with his son.

name: Woman in Gold
summary_text: Maria Altmann, an octogenarian Jewish refugee, takes on the Austrian government to recover artwork she believes rightfully belongs to her family.

name: Automata
summary_text: Human race is at edge of the end. Robot race is at edge of the beginning.

name: The Boxtrolls
summary_text: A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator.

name: Wet Hot American Summer
summary_text: Set on the last day of camp, in the hot summer of 1981, a group of counselors try to complete their unfinished business before the day ends.

name: The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
summary_text: Four best girlfriends hatch a plan to stay connected with one another as their lives start off in different directions: they pass around a pair of secondhand jeans that fits each of their bodies perfectly.

name: Blackhat
summary_text: A furloughed convict and his American and Chinese partners hunt a high-level cybercrime network from Chicago to Los Angeles to Hong Kong to Jakarta.

name: Tokyo Story
summary_text: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

name: Pete's Dragon
summary_text: The adventures of an orphaned boy named Pete and his best friend Elliott, who happens to be a dragon.

name: Rumor Has It...
summary_text: Sarah Huttinger is a woman who learns that her family was the inspiration for the book and film "The Graduate" -- and that she just might be the offspring of the well-documented event.

name: The Age of Innocence
summary_text: A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

name: Thirteen Days
summary_text: In October 1962, the Kennedy administration struggles to contain the Cuban Missile Crisis.

name: Dinosaur
summary_text: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sanctuary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

name: The Pledge
summary_text: A retiring police detective pledges to catch the killer of a young child.

name: Enes Batur Hayal mi Gerçek mi?
summary_text: Enes Batur has to decide between going to college or being a professional YouTuber.

name: The Whole Ten Yards
summary_text: Jimmy the Tulip's (Bruce Willis) quiet new life is shaken up by his old pal Oz (Matthew Perry), whose wife (Natasha Henstridge) has been kidnapped by a Hungarian mob. The Tulip and his wife Jill (Amanda Peet) spring into action.

name: A River Runs Through It
summary_text: The story about two sons of a stern minister -- one reserved, one rebellious -- growing up in rural Montana while devoted to fly fishing.

name: Rendition
summary_text: When a terrorist bombing in North Africa kills 19 incl. an American, an Egyptian chemical engineer flying from South Africa to his wife in USA, is arrested upon arriving USA. He disappears. His wife asks senator for help.

name: The Wailing
summary_text: Soon after a stranger arrives in a little village, a mysterious sickness starts spreading. A policeman, drawn into the incident, is forced to solve the mystery in order to save his daughter.

name: The Peacemaker
summary_text: A US Army colonel and a civilian woman supervising him must track down stolen Russian nuclear weapons before they're used by terrorists.

name: His Girl Friday
summary_text: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

name: Chaplin
summary_text: An elderly Charlie Chaplin discusses his autobiography with his editor, recounting his amazing journey from his poverty-stricken childhood to world-wide success after the ingenious invention of the Little Tramp.

name: The General's Daughter
summary_text: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

name: The Battle of Algiers
summary_text: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

name: How High
summary_text: Two guys by the name of Silas and Jamal decided to one day smoke something magical, which eventually helps them to ace their college entrance exam.

name: Just My Luck
summary_text: Manhattanite Ashley is known to many as the luckiest woman around. After a chance encounter with a down-and-out young man, however, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his.

name: LOL
summary_text: As a new year at school begins, Lola's heart is broken by her boyfriend, though soon she's surprised by her best friend, promising musician Kyle, who reveals his feelings for her.

name: Victoria
summary_text: A young Spanish woman who has recently moved to Berlin finds her flirtation with a local guy turn potentially deadly as their night out with his friends reveals a dangerous secret.

name: Vampires
summary_text: Recovering from an ambush that killed his entire team, a vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to walk in sunlight.

name: My Bloody Valentine
summary_text: Tom returns to his hometown on the tenth anniversary of the Valentine's night massacre that claimed the lives of 22 people. Instead of a homecoming, Tom finds himself suspected of committing the murders, and it seems like his old flame is the only one that believes he's innocent.

name: Step Up Revolution
summary_text: Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.

name: Original Sin
summary_text: A woman, along with her lover, plans to con a rich man by marrying him, earning his trust, and then running away with all his money. Everything goes as planned until she falls in love with him.

name: Ida
summary_text: A novice nun about to take her vows uncovers a family secret dating back to the German occupation.

name: Apollo 18
summary_text: Decades-old found footage from NASA's abandoned Apollo 18 mission, where three American astronauts were sent on a secret expedition, reveals the reason the U.S. has never returned to the moon.

name: Inland Empire
summary_text: As an actress begins to adopt the persona of her character in a film, her world becomes nightmarish and surreal.

name: Wristcutters: A Love Story
summary_text: A film set in a strange afterlife way station that has been reserved for people who have committed suicide.

name: The Voices
summary_text: A likable guy pursues his office crush with the help of his evil talking pets, but things turn sinister when she stands him up for a date.

name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
summary_text: When strange seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade San Francisco, California, where they replicate the residents into emotionless automatons one body at a time.

name: Ride Along 2
summary_text: As his wedding day approaches, Ben heads to Miami with his soon-to-be brother-in-law James to bring down a drug dealer who's supplying the dealers of Atlanta with product.

name: Pale Rider
summary_text: A mysterious preacher (Clint Eastwood) protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

name: The Legend of Bagger Vance
summary_text: A down-and-out golfer attempts to recover his game and his life with help from a mystical caddy.

name: The Ice Storm
summary_text: In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle-class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.

name: Whisper of the Heart
summary_text: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

name: House on Haunted Hill
summary_text: An amusement park mogul offers a group of diverse people $1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.

name: Sanctum
summary_text: An underwater cave diving team experiences a life-threatening crisis during an expedition to the unexplored and least accessible cave system in the world.

name: Tully
summary_text: A struggling mother of three forms an unexpected bond with the night nanny hired to help with her newborn baby.

name: Murder by Numbers
summary_text: Two gifted high school students execute a "perfect" murder - then become engaged in an intellectual contest with a seasoned homicide detective.

name: Battleship Potemkin
summary_text: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

name: Last Man Standing
summary_text: A drifting gunslinger-for-hire finds himself in the middle of an ongoing war between the Irish and Italian mafia in a Prohibition era ghost town.

name: Crocodile Dundee II
summary_text: Australian outback expert protects his New York love from gangsters who've followed her down under.

name: Days of Heaven
summary_text: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.

name: Spectral
summary_text: A sci-fi/thriller story centered on a special-ops team that is dispatched to fight supernatural beings.

name: In Good Company
summary_text: A middle-aged ad exec is faced with a new boss who's nearly half his age... and who also happens to be sleeping with his daughter.

name: The Rocketeer
summary_text: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high-flying masked hero.

name: Free State of Jones
summary_text: A disillusioned Confederate army deserter returns to Mississippi and leads a militia of fellow deserters and women in an uprising against the corrupt local Confederate government.

name: Insidious: The Last Key
summary_text: Parapsychologist Dr. Elise Rainier faces her most fearsome and personal haunting yet, as she is drawn back to her ghostly childhood home, where the terror began.

name: The Jerk
summary_text: A simpleminded, sheltered country boy suddenly decides to leave his family home to experience life in the big city, where his naivete is both his best friend and his worst enemy.

name: 21 Bridges
summary_text: An embattled NYPD detective is thrust into a citywide manhunt for a pair of cop killers after uncovering a massive and unexpected conspiracy.
